title: Japanese Pickles!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Ugh, it smells kind of weird....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s called Nukadzuke. The smell might be unpleasant if you’re not used to it, but it’s super delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>There’s no match for Ai-san’s grandma’s Nukadzuke. I want you to try it, Mia-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Alright, just a little bit.... *munch*, *crunch crunch*.... Yummy!! Japanese pickles!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Pickles?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aah, Ai guesses all kinds of pickles are just called pickles in English. Technically, there is a difference between pickles made with rice bran and those made with vinegar.... but that doesn’t matter! They’re good as long as they taste good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I love it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yaaay! Eat more, you two~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>*Crunch crunch*.... It’s tasty.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ah, I’ll have some more too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
